name: UnionRTLSMessageEventsAndRTLSMessageEvents
title: Union of RTLS Message Events And RTLS Message Events

concept.definition: Used to describe when a subscriber wants to receive notifications about a specific tag.
Used to describe when a subscriber no longer wants to receive notifications about a specific tag.
Used to describe when a specific tag has an updated location.
Used to describe when a staff member is in duress.
